H0.text: Pityriasis Capitis is the technical term for. Dandruff

H1.text: Pityriasis Capitis is the technical term for. Cradle Cap

H2.text: Pityriasis Capitis is the technical term for. Eczema

H3.text: Pityriasis Capitis is the technical term for. Scurf

A4.text: Pityriasis Capitis is a skin condition of the scalp. Symptoms include heavy flaking and sometimes mild itchiness.
